document_name: Order No. 2014-0230-MEA-SG establishing the organisational and operational modalities of the National Climate Change Committee of Mali
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MLI/2014/MLI-2014-01-31-Order No. 2014-0230-MEA-SG establishing the organisational and operational modalities of the National Climate Change Committee of Mali_c84084fa86bd4f5e12e4ef2271ea4816.pdf
document_description: The present decree establishes the modalities of organization and functioning of the National Committee Climate change of Mali.
